asius

Java utility framework for SFDC

Lasius is a utility framework for simplifying connectivity to Salesforce custom web services as well as the metadata API, and enterpise/partner web services in Java.

Dependencies

  • Java 1.6
  • FlossWare Utils

License

GPLv2

Authors

Scot Floess

Contact

Lasius (lasius@deadlypenguin.com)

The developers also hang around on #salesforce and #solenopsis on IRC (freenode)

Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running:

$ git clone git://github.com/solenopsis/Lasius


get the source code on GitHub : solenopsis/Lasius
